title: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: I am unable to access the scoped type hierarchy on binary projects. I don't understand how to resolve this issue.
OB: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection
EB: The scoped type hierarchy should be displayed which allows me to navigate through the types in the binary project.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a binary project 2. Select a file in the binary project 3. Press F4 to open the type hierarchy
